You attack with your sharp and piercing claws. <rgb=#FF7700> 
 
 In Flayer: Raking Claws 
 Adds a bleed effect. 
 Brute bonus: Interupts targets inductions 
 
 In Shadow: Bestial Claw 
 Deals more damage than Claws and has a much greater chance to critically hit.  </rgb> 

   <rgb=#00FFDD>Increased damage when attacking from behind</rgb>
